fc.config.validated_color_r: Red part of an RGBA color; enter an integer between 0 and 255.
fc.config.validated_color_g: Green part of an RGBA color; enter an integer between 0 and 255.
fc.config.validated_color_b: Blue part of an RGBA color; enter an integer between 0 and 255.
fc.config.validated_color_a: Alpha part of an RGBA color; enter an integer between 0 (transparent) and 255 (opaque). The mod author may lock this to 255 only.
test.walkable.testChildDave.testChildBoo: Dave's favorite boolean. Please treat it well.
